application-versions.name: Liferay CMS deployment
application-versions.description: Third release - includes monitoring. DB server is MySql instead of Oracle. At the end of deployment, just connect to port 80 of Web Server machine. If a Proxy Error pops out, it just mean the Application Server is still compiling freshly deployed java code. Just wait a couple of minutes for it to finish.

service-version.name: JBoss on Linux
service-version.description: Clusterable JBoss 5.1 on Linux JBoss Application Server is the open source implementation of the Java EE suite of services. It comprises a set of offerings for enterprise customers who are looking for preconfigured profiles of JBoss Enterprise Middleware components that have been tested and certified together to provide an integrated experience. It's easy-to-use server architecture and high flexibility makes JBoss the ideal choice for users just starting out with J2EE, as well as senior architects looking for a customizable middleware platform.

ns9:component-version-script.description: JBoss configure yum repo, also update all packages, install jBoss server
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:$JAVA_HOME/bin set -e
# Set Install Path to the default install path (For monitoring) Install_Path=/home/jboss/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME echo Install_Path is set to $Install_Path, please modify this script if the install path is not correct.
#Setup JBoss
cd /tmp mv $cheetah_tgz_url . filename=`basename $cheetah_tgz_url` CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH=/tmp/$filename mv $zip_url . filename=`basename $zip_url` JBOSS_ZIP_PATH=/tmp/$filename echo "PATH: $PATH" > properties.txt echo "cheetah_install_script: $cheetah_install_script " >> properties.txt echo "jboss_install_script: $jboss_install_script" >> properties.txt echo "CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH: $CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_ZIP_PATH: $JBOSS_ZIP_PATH" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION: $JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME: $JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_USER: $JBOSS_JMX_USER" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_PWD: $JBOSS_JMX_PWD" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE: $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE: $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE" >> properties.txt . $cheetah_install_script 2>&1 | tee /tmp/cheetah_output . $jboss_install_script

#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:$JAVA_HOME/bin set -e
service jboss start
TEST=`service jboss status` if [[ {$TEST} = *running* ]]; then echo "Jboss service is running" else echo "Jboss service is not running. Please check the logs." exit 1 fi

ns9:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for JBoss app server
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for JBoss service to update JBOSS_JMX_USER, JBOSS_JMX_PWD and JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "JBoss server UPDATE."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:$JAVA_HOME/bin set -e
[ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_USER" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_USER" && exit 1 [ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_PWD" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_PWD" && exit 1 [ -z "$JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER" && exit 1
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(JBOSS_JMX_USER|JBOSS_JMX_PWD|JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
echo "Stop JBoss service" service jboss stop sleep 60
HOME_DIR=/home/jboss export JBOSS_USER=jboss export JBOSS_HOME=$HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as BOOTRC=/etc/init.d/jboss
echo "Re-generate JBoss booting script..." cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE > $BOOTRC
echo "Update jmx console users..." JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR=$JBOSS_HOME/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME
cd $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/conf/props cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE > jmx-console-users.properties
sed -ibak '/<bean class="org.jboss.services.binding.ServiceBindingMetadata">$/{ N N s/\(<property name="serviceName">jboss.web:service=WebServer<\/property>\n\s*<property name="port">\)\([0-9]*\)\(<\/property>\)/\1'$JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER'\3/ }' $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/conf/bindingservice.beans/META-INF/bindings-jboss-beans.xml
echo "Starting JBoss service again..." service jboss start
echo "Finished JBoss Server UPDATE"

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns9:component-version-script.description: ROLLBACK-lifecycle script for JBoss app server
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the ROLLBACK lifecycle script for JBoss service to update JBOSS_JMX_USER, JBOSS_JMX_PWD and JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "JBoss server ROLLBACK."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:$JAVA_HOME/bin set -e
[ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_USER" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_USER" && exit 1 [ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_PWD" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_PWD" && exit 1 [ -z "$JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER" && exit 1
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(JBOSS_JMX_USER|JBOSS_JMX_PWD|JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This rollback script does not support the rollback of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 0; fi
echo "Stop JBoss service" service jboss stop # Confirm. jboss is stopped wait_limit=36 wait_c=0 for (( ; wait_c<wait_limit; wait_c++ )) do if [[ `service jboss status` == *stopped* ]];then break fi sleep 5 done if [ $wait_c -eq $wait_limit ];then echo "Failed to stop JBoss in three minutes. Exiting." exit 1 fi
HOME_DIR=/home/jboss export JBOSS_USER=jboss export JBOSS_HOME=$HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as BOOTRC=/etc/init.d/jboss
echo "Re-generate JBoss booting script..." cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE > $BOOTRC
echo "Update jmx console users..." JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR=$JBOSS_HOME/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME
cd $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/conf/props cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE > jmx-console-users.properties
sed -ibak '/<bean class="org.jboss.services.binding.ServiceBindingMetadata">$/{ N N s/\(<property name="serviceName">jboss.web:service=WebServer<\/property>\n\s*<property name="port">\)\([0-9]*\)\(<\/property>\)/\1'$JBOSS_PORT_NUMBER'\3/ }' $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/conf/bindingservice.beans/META-INF/bindings-jboss-beans.xml
echo "Starting JBoss service again..." service jboss start
# Confirm. jboss is started wait_limit=36 wait_c=0 for (( ; wait_c<wait_limit; wait_c++ )) do if [[ `service jboss status` == *running* ]];then break fi sleep 5 done if [ $wait_c -eq $wait_limit ];then echo "Failed to start JBoss in three minutes. Exiting." exit 1 fi echo "Finished JBoss Server ROLLBACK"

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
## FUNCTION TO CHECK ERROR AND EITHER LOG ADVANCEMENT OR LOG ERROR AND EXIT function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; else echo "$2"; fi }
function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
PROGNAME=`basename $0`
# Stop the application server. This parameter should point to the script used to stop the application server. echo "stop the service" $service_stop check_error "ERROR - Can't stop JBOSS service" "JBOSS stopped"
cd /tmp/
####WAR FILE AND DEPENDENCY FILES DOWNLOAD####
if [ "$download_mode" == "CIFS" ] then ###Avoids smbget to always exit with an error code if [ ! -d /root/.smb ] then mkdir /root/.smb fi if [ ! -e /root/.smb/smb.conf ] then touch /root/.smb/smb.conf fi if [ ! -e /root/.smb/smb.conf.append ] then touch /root/.smb/smb.conf.append fi
smbget smb://$remote_user:$remote_pwd@$remote_path/$war_file check_error "ERROR - Cannot download war file $remote_path/$war_file" "war file $remote_path/$war_file downloaded succesfully" chown $jboss_user: /tmp/$war_file for (( i = 0; i < ${#dependency_files[@]} ; i++ )) do smbget smb://$remote_user:$remote_pwd@$remote_path/${dependency_files[$i]} check_error "ERROR - Cannot download dependency file $remote_path/${dependency_files[$i]}" "Dependency file $remote_path/${dependency_files[$i]} downloaded succesfully" chown $jboss_user: /tmp/${dependency_files[$i]} done elif [ "$download_mode" == "NFS" ] then mount $remote_path /mnt check_error "ERROR - unable to mount nfs share $remote_path" "Successfully mounted remote nfs share $remote_path" cp /mnt/$war_file /tmp/ check_error "ERROR - Cannot download war file $remote_path/$war_file" "war file $remote_path/$war_file downloaded succesfully" chown $jboss_user: /tmp/$war_file for (( i = 0; i < ${#dependency_files[@]} ; i++ )) do cp /mnt/${dependency_files[$i]} /tmp/ check_error "ERROR - Cannot download dependency file ${dependency_files[$i]}" "Dependency file ${dependency_files[$i]} downloaded succesfully" chown $jboss_user: /tmp/${dependency_files[$i]} done umount /mnt else error_exit "Copy method not implemented" fi
####COPY DEPENDENCY FILES TO TARGET DIRECTORY####
for (( i = 0; i < ${#dependency_files[@]} ; i++ )) do su - $jboss_user -c "mv /tmp/${dependency_files[$i]} $dependency_dir" check_error "ERROR - Cannot move file ${dependency_files[$i]} to $dependency_dir" "Dependency file ${dependency_files[$i]} copied succesfully" done
####PRE DEPLOYMENT SPECIFIC CONFIGURATIONS - TO BE CHANGED ACCORDING TO DEPLOYMENT GUIDE#### if [ "$pre_deployment_custom_activities" == "true" ] then ###ADD ALL ACTIVITIES IN ARRAY BELOW, ONE FOR EACH ROW, DOUBLE OR SINGLE QUOTES DELIMITED### declare -a ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE=( "rm -f $jboss_home/common/lib/hibernate-validator.jar" "rm -f $jboss_home/common/lib/hsqldb.jar" "rm -f $jboss_home/common/lib/hsqldb-plugin.jar" "sed -i -e '41,64 s/\(.*\)//' $jboss_home/server/default/conf/login-config.xml" "sed -i -e 's/Xms128m/Xms1024m/' /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/jboss-as/bin/run.conf" "sed -i -e 's/Xmx512m/Xmx2048m/' /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/jboss-as/bin/run.conf" "rm -rf $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/messaging" "rm -rf /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/jboss-as/server/default/deploy/profileservice-secured.jar" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ejb2-container-jboss-beans.xml" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ejb2-timer-service.xml" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ejb3-connectors-jboss-beans.xml" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ejb3-container-jboss-beans.xml" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ejb3-interceptors-aop.xml" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ejb3-timerservice-jboss-beans.xml" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/hsqldb-ds.xml" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/jms-ra.rar" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/mail-ra.rar" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/mail-service.xml" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/profile-service-secured.jar" "rm -rf $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/uuid-key-generator.sar" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deployers/jboss-ejb3-endpoint-deployer.jar" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deployers/messaging-definitions-jboss-beans.xml" )
for (( i = 0; i < ${#ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE[@]} ; i++ )) do eval "${ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE[$i]}" check_error "ERROR - Failed to execute ${ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE[$i]}" "${ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE[$i]} succesfully executed" done fi
####WAR DEPLOYMENT#### if [ "$(ls -A $deployment_directory)" ] then rm -rf $deployment_directory/* check_error "ERROR - Failed to remove files from $deployment_directory" "$deployment_directory succesfully cleaned" fi
su - $jboss_user -c "unzip /tmp/$war_file -d $deployment_directory" check_error "ERROR - Failed to unzip WAR file from $deployment_directory" "WAR file succesfully unzipped to $deployment_directory"
####POST DEPLOYMENT SPECIFIC CONFIGURATIONS - TO BE CHANGED ACCORDING TO DEPLOYMENT GUIDE#### if [ "$post_deployment_custom_activities" == "true" ] then ###ADD ALL ACTIVITIES IN ARRAY BELOW, ONE FOR EACH ROW, DOUBLE OR SINGLE QUOTES DELIMITED### declare -a ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE=( "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ROOT.war/WEB-INF/lib/jaxrpc.jar" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ROOT.war/WEB-INF/lib/stax.jar" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ROOT.war/WEB-INF/lib/xercesImpl.jar" "rm -f $jboss_home/server/default/deploy/ROOT.war/WEB-INF/lib/xml-apis.jar" "echo 'auto.deploy.jboss.dest.dir=\${jboss.home.dir}/server/default/deploy' > /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/portal-ext.properties" "echo \"auto.deploy.deploy.dir=$jboss_home/deploy\" >> /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/portal-ext.properties" "echo \"jdbc.default.driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver\" >> /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/portal-ext.properties" "echo \"jdbc.default.url=jdbc:mysql://$mysql_url/lportal?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8&useFastDateParsing=false\" >> /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/portal-ext.properties" "echo \"jdbc.default.username=$mysql_user\" >> /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/portal-ext.properties" "echo \"jdbc.default.password=$mysql_pwd\" >> /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/portal-ext.properties" "chown $jboss_user: /home/jboss/jboss-5.1.0.GA/portal-ext.properties" )
for (( i = 0; i < ${#ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE[@]} ; i++ )) do eval "${ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE[$i]}" check_error "ERROR - Failed to execute ${ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE[$i]}" "${ACTIVITIES_TO_BE_DONE[$i]} succesfully executed" done fi
# Start the application server. This parameter should point to the script used to start the application server. echo "start the service" $service_start

service-version.name: Hyperic HQ Agent
service-version.description: Hyperic HQ Agent 5.0.0 service Find, fix and prevent performance problems in custom web applications, whether running on physical, virtual, or cloud infrastructure. With its ability to continuously monitor 50,000 metrics across 75 web technologies, Hyperic provides sysadmins the deep visibility they need to ensure server performance, reduce downtime, and meet SLAs. Hyperic automatically discovers new virtual machines as they come online, eliminating the need for manual updating of monitoring configurations.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e source /etc/profile
#20140225 - Marco - Making script more robust and adding Hyperic server API call (so that crontab entry is now not needed). Adding also API calls to make Oracle configuration work automatically.
#tmp staging dir for setting up installer export INSTALL_PATH="/tmp/vmware/HQ"
LOG_FILE=/tmp/appdirector-agent.log
echo "Start Hyperic Agent configuration. " >> ${LOG_FILE}
HQ_AGENT_INSTALL_DIR=/home/hyperic/ # Hyperic agent home, e.g "/home/hyperic/hyperic-hq-agent-4.6.0" HQ_AGENT_HOME=`find ${HQ_AGENT_INSTALL_DIR} -name "hyperic-hqee-agent-*"` HQ_AGENT_PROPS=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/agent.properties
if [ "x${HQ_AGENT_PORT}" != "x" ] ; then
HQ_AGENT_PORT=${HQ_AGENT_PORT} else
HQ_AGENT_PORT=2144 fi
if [ "x${HQ_SERVER_IP}" != "x" ] ; then
HQ_SERVER_IP=${HQ_SERVER_IP} fi
echo "Start to write Hyperic property file." >> ${LOG_FILE}
echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.agent.server.AgentDListProvider=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.agent.server.MeasurementSchedule=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.layout.ConversionPattern=%d %-5p [%t] [%c{1}] %m%n" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.measurement.agent.server.SenderThread=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.apache.http=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.File=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/log/agent.log" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.category.org.apache.axis=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.MaxBackupIndex=1" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "autoinventory.runtimeScan.interval.millis=86400000" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.product.pluginxml=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.MaxFileSize=5000KB" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "agent.logLevel.SystemOut=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.util.units=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.rootLogger=INFO, R" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "agent.logFile=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/log/agent.log" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS}
# Approve Platform echo "# Approve Platform" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "platform = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve MySQL if [ "x${HQ_approve_MySql}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve MySQL" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x.jdbcUser = ${HQ_MySQL_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_MySQL_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x.jdbcUser = ${HQ_MySQL_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_MySQL_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Postgres if [ "x${HQ_approve_PostgreSQL}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Postgres" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.user = ${HQ_Postgres_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.pass = ${HQ_Postgres_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.program = ${HQ_Postgres_home}/bin/" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.user = ${HQ_Postgres_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.pass = ${HQ_Postgres_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.program = ${HQ_Postgres_home}/bin/" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Tomcat if [ "x${HQ_approve_Tomcat}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Tomcat" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.username = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.password = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.url = service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_port}/jmxrmi" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.username = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.password = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.url = service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_port}/jmxrmi" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve JBoss if [ "x${HQ_approve_JBoss}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve JBoss" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "JBoss\ 5.1 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve TC Server if [ "x${HQ_approve_TcServer}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve TC Server" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "SpringSource\ tc\ Runtime\ 7.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "SpringSource\ tc\ Runtime\ 6.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Apache if [ "x${HQ_approve_Apache}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Apache" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ httpd = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
## Marco - Approve Oracle if [ "x${HQ_approve_Oracle}" != "x" ]; then echo "Oracle\ 11g = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcUrl = jdbc:oracle:thin:@${HQ_ORACLE_SERVER}.${HQ_ORACLE_DOMAIN}:${HQ_ORACLE_PORT}:${HQ_ORACLE_SID}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_ORACLE_PASSWORD}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcUser = ${HQ_ORACLE_USER}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.tnsnames = network/admin/tnsnames.ora" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.process.ptql = State.Name.eq=oracle,Args.0.sw=ora_" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
if [ -d ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data ]; then echo "rm -fR ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data" >> ${LOG_FILE} rm -fR ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data fi
echo "Start Hyperic Agent." >> ${LOG_FILE} ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/bin/hq-agent.sh start &>/tmp/agent.startup.log
if grep -q Failure /tmp/agent.startup.log; then echo "Failed to start Hyperic Agent." >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1 else echo "Hyperic Agent Started." >> ${LOG_FILE} ### If the agent starts, we can proceed with API calls to automatically add platforms and servers into Hyperic mv $HQ_API_PACKAGE $INSTALL_PATH/packages/hq_apis_src.tar.gz
HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR=/home/hyperic/
chmod 777 -R ${INSTALL_PATH}
echo "Unpack Hyperic API package." >> ${LOG_FILE} tar -xvzf $INSTALL_PATH/packages/hq_apis_src.tar.gz -C $HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR
# Hyperic agent home, e.g "/home/hyperic/hyperic-hq-agent-5.0" - Marco fixed. New name structure HQ_API_HOME=`find ${HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR} -name "hqapi1-client-*"`
echo $HQ_API_HOME
##Creating connection credentials mkdir ~/.hq echo "host=${HQ_SERVER_IP}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "port=${HQ_SERVER_PORT}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "secure=false" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "user=${HQ_ADMIN_USER}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "password=${HQ_ADMIN_PASS}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties
MY_HOSTNAME=`hostname -f` #Waiting for the Platform to show up in Hyperic Server i=0; while [ "x`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh autodiscovery list|grep ${MY_HOSTNAME}`" = "x" ] do ((i++)); echo "Waiting for platform to show up in Hyperic Server. Try number ${i}" >> ${LOG_FILE} if [ $i -eq 10 ] then echo "Platform failed to show up in Hyperic Server" >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1; fi sleep 10; done echo "Found platform, adding it" >> ${LOG_FILE} ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh autodiscovery approve --regex="${MY_HOSTNAME}" >> ${LOG_FILE}
#Adding Servers (using Hyperic naming convention here...) that require specific activities for monitoring to automatically start ####Oracle DB Server#### i=0; if [ "x${HQ_approve_Oracle}" != "x" ]; then while [ "x`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --prototype="Oracle 11g"|grep "${MY_HOSTNAME}"|awk '{print $2;}'|sed s/id=//`" = "x" ] do ((i++)); echo "Waiting for Oracle server to show up in Hyperic Server. Try number ${i}" >> ${LOG_FILE} if [ $i -eq 10 ] then echo "Oracle server failed to show up in Hyperic Server" >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1; fi sleep 10; done echo "Found Oracle Instance, adding it" >> ${LOG_FILE} ORACLE_HQ_ID=`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --prototype="Oracle 11g"|grep "${MY_HOSTNAME}"|awk '{print $2;}'|sed s/id=//|sed s/\"//g` ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --id ${ORACLE_HQ_ID} >/tmp/oracleDescriptor.xml ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource sync --file /tmp/oracleDescriptor.xml fi ####End of Oracle DB Server####
fi

service-version.description: Hyperic HQ Agent 5.0.0 service Find, fix and prevent performance problems in custom web applications, whether running on physical, virtual, or cloud infrastructure. With its ability to continuously monitor 50,000 metrics across 75 web technologies, Hyperic provides sysadmins the deep visibility they need to ensure server performance, reduce downtime, and meet SLAs. Hyperic automatically discovers new virtual machines as they come online, eliminating the need for manual updating of monitoring configurations.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e source /etc/profile
#20140225 - Marco - Making script more robust and adding Hyperic server API call (so that crontab entry is now not needed). Adding also API calls to make Oracle configuration work automatically.
#tmp staging dir for setting up installer export INSTALL_PATH="/tmp/vmware/HQ"
LOG_FILE=/tmp/appdirector-agent.log
echo "Start Hyperic Agent configuration. " >> ${LOG_FILE}
HQ_AGENT_INSTALL_DIR=/home/hyperic/ # Hyperic agent home, e.g "/home/hyperic/hyperic-hq-agent-4.6.0" HQ_AGENT_HOME=`find ${HQ_AGENT_INSTALL_DIR} -name "hyperic-hqee-agent-*"` HQ_AGENT_PROPS=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/agent.properties
if [ "x${HQ_AGENT_PORT}" != "x" ] ; then
HQ_AGENT_PORT=${HQ_AGENT_PORT} else
HQ_AGENT_PORT=2144 fi
if [ "x${HQ_SERVER_IP}" != "x" ] ; then
HQ_SERVER_IP=${HQ_SERVER_IP} fi
echo "Start to write Hyperic property file." >> ${LOG_FILE}
echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.agent.server.AgentDListProvider=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.agent.server.MeasurementSchedule=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.layout.ConversionPattern=%d %-5p [%t] [%c{1}] %m%n" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.measurement.agent.server.SenderThread=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.apache.http=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.File=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/log/agent.log" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.category.org.apache.axis=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.MaxBackupIndex=1" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "autoinventory.runtimeScan.interval.millis=86400000" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.product.pluginxml=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.MaxFileSize=5000KB" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "agent.logLevel.SystemOut=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.util.units=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.rootLogger=INFO, R" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "agent.logFile=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/log/agent.log" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS}
# Approve Platform echo "# Approve Platform" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "platform = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve MySQL if [ "x${HQ_approve_MySql}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve MySQL" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x.jdbcUser = ${HQ_MySQL_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_MySQL_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x.jdbcUser = ${HQ_MySQL_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_MySQL_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Postgres if [ "x${HQ_approve_PostgreSQL}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Postgres" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.user = ${HQ_Postgres_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.pass = ${HQ_Postgres_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.program = ${HQ_Postgres_home}/bin/" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.user = ${HQ_Postgres_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.pass = ${HQ_Postgres_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.program = ${HQ_Postgres_home}/bin/" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Tomcat if [ "x${HQ_approve_Tomcat}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Tomcat" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.username = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.password = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.url = service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_port}/jmxrmi" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.username = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.password = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.url = service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_port}/jmxrmi" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve JBoss if [ "x${HQ_approve_JBoss}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve JBoss" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "JBoss\ 5.1 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve TC Server if [ "x${HQ_approve_TcServer}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve TC Server" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "SpringSource\ tc\ Runtime\ 7.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "SpringSource\ tc\ Runtime\ 6.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Apache if [ "x${HQ_approve_Apache}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Apache" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ httpd = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
## Marco - Approve Oracle if [ "x${HQ_approve_Oracle}" != "x" ]; then echo "Oracle\ 11g = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcUrl = jdbc:oracle:thin:@${HQ_ORACLE_SERVER}.${HQ_ORACLE_DOMAIN}:${HQ_ORACLE_PORT}:${HQ_ORACLE_SID}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_ORACLE_PASSWORD}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcUser = ${HQ_ORACLE_USER}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.tnsnames = network/admin/tnsnames.ora" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.process.ptql = State.Name.eq=oracle,Args.0.sw=ora_" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
if [ -d ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data ]; then echo "rm -fR ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data" >> ${LOG_FILE} rm -fR ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data fi
echo "Start Hyperic Agent." >> ${LOG_FILE} ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/bin/hq-agent.sh start &>/tmp/agent.startup.log
if grep -q Failure /tmp/agent.startup.log; then echo "Failed to start Hyperic Agent." >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1 else echo "Hyperic Agent Started." >> ${LOG_FILE} ### If the agent starts, we can proceed with API calls to automatically add platforms and servers into Hyperic mv $HQ_API_PACKAGE $INSTALL_PATH/packages/hq_apis_src.tar.gz
HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR=/home/hyperic/
chmod 777 -R ${INSTALL_PATH}
echo "Unpack Hyperic API package." >> ${LOG_FILE} tar -xvzf $INSTALL_PATH/packages/hq_apis_src.tar.gz -C $HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR
# Hyperic agent home, e.g "/home/hyperic/hyperic-hq-agent-5.0" - Marco fixed. New name structure HQ_API_HOME=`find ${HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR} -name "hqapi1-client-*"`
echo $HQ_API_HOME
##Creating connection credentials mkdir ~/.hq echo "host=${HQ_SERVER_IP}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "port=${HQ_SERVER_PORT}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "secure=false" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "user=${HQ_ADMIN_USER}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "password=${HQ_ADMIN_PASS}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties
MY_HOSTNAME=`hostname -f` #Waiting for the Platform to show up in Hyperic Server i=0; while [ "x`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh autodiscovery list|grep ${MY_HOSTNAME}`" = "x" ] do ((i++)); echo "Waiting for platform to show up in Hyperic Server. Try number ${i}" >> ${LOG_FILE} if [ $i -eq 10 ] then echo "Platform failed to show up in Hyperic Server" >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1; fi sleep 10; done echo "Found platform, adding it" >> ${LOG_FILE} ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh autodiscovery approve --regex="${MY_HOSTNAME}" >> ${LOG_FILE}
#Adding Servers (using Hyperic naming convention here...) that require specific activities for monitoring to automatically start ####Oracle DB Server#### i=0; if [ "x${HQ_approve_Oracle}" != "x" ]; then while [ "x`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --prototype="Oracle 11g"|grep "${MY_HOSTNAME}"|awk '{print $2;}'|sed s/id=//`" = "x" ] do ((i++)); echo "Waiting for Oracle server to show up in Hyperic Server. Try number ${i}" >> ${LOG_FILE} if [ $i -eq 10 ] then echo "Oracle server failed to show up in Hyperic Server" >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1; fi sleep 10; done echo "Found Oracle Instance, adding it" >> ${LOG_FILE} ORACLE_HQ_ID=`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --prototype="Oracle 11g"|grep "${MY_HOSTNAME}"|awk '{print $2;}'|sed s/id=//|sed s/\"//g` ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --id ${ORACLE_HQ_ID} >/tmp/oracleDescriptor.xml ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource sync --file /tmp/oracleDescriptor.xml fi ####End of Oracle DB Server####
fi

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Fix the linux-firmware package export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y linux-firmware < /dev/console > /dev/console # Install MySQL package apt-get install -y mysql-server else yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install -x MySQL-server-community mysql-server fi
# Set Install Path to the default install path (For monitoring) Install_Path=/usr echo Install_Path is set to $Install_Path, please modify this script if the install path is not correct.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# update mysql configuration to handle big packets sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ max_allowed_packet=$max_allowed_packet/g" $my_cnf_file # update listening port sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
sed -i "s/port.*=.*[0-9]*/port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql restart else # set up auto-start on booting chkconfig mysqld on # restart mysqld service service mysqld start fi
# this will assign a password for mysql admin user 'root' mysqladmin -u $db_root_username password $db_root_password

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns9:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for changing the MySQL properties
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for MySql service to update db_port and/or db_root_password. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "MySQL server UPDATE to update db_port and db_root_password"
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(db_port|db_root_password)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
# update root password if [[ "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "" && "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "$db_root_password" ]]; then echo "update root password" mysqladmin -u $db_root_username -p"$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" password "$db_root_password" fi
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_port' property changed. # The APPD_UPDATE_PROPS environment variable contains an array of changed and affected properties. if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'db_port'` != "" ]]; then echo "stop the mysql service before updating the port number" if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then if [[ `service mysql status` == *running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysql stop fi else if [[ `service mysqld status` == *is\ running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysqld stop fi fi
echo "update listening port to $db_port" sed -ie "s/port.*=.*[0-9]*/port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
# start the mysql service after updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then echo "Make sure that MySQL is started" service mysql start else service mysqld start fi fi
echo "Finished MySQL Server UPDATE"

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns9:component-version-script.description: ROLLBACK-lifecycle script for rolling-back the MySQL properties
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the ROLLBACK lifecycle script for MySql service to rollback db_port and/or db_root_password. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "MySQL server ROLLBACK to update db_port and db_root_password"
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
# update root password if [[ "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "" && "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "$db_root_password" ]]; then echo "update root password" echo "Verify if $db_root_username can be logged in using previous password" DUMMY_SQL_SCRIPT_FILE=dummy_sql_script_file.sql echo "select '' from dual;" >$DUMMY_SQL_SCRIPT_FILE mysql -u"$db_root_username" -p"$db_root_password" <$DUMMY_SQL_SCRIPT_FILE if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "Rollback of db_root_passowrd is not required because $db_root_username can be logged-in using previous password." else mysqladmin -u $db_root_username -p"$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" password "$db_root_password" echo "Root password updated successfully" fi fi
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_port' property changed. # The APPD_UPDATE_PROPS environment variable contains an array of changed and affected properties. if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'db_port'` != "" ]]; then echo "stop the mysql service before updating the port number" if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then if [[ `service mysql status` == *running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysql stop fi else if [[ `service mysqld status` == *running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysqld stop fi fi
echo "rollback listening port to $db_port" sed -ie "s/port.*=.*[0-9]*/port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
# start the mysql service after updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then echo "Make sure that MySQL is started" service mysql start if [[ `service mysql status` == *running* ]]; then echo "MySQL started." else echo "Failed to start MySQL." fi else service mysqld start if [[ `service mysqld status` == *running* ]]; then echo "MySQL started." else echo "Failed to start MySQL." fi fi fi
echo "Finished MySQL Server ROLLBACK"

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# set up static port and proxy port to listen if [ ! "$http_port" == "80" ]; then sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf else # setup proxy port only to listen sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf fi
# set up auto-start on booting chkconfig httpd on
if [ ! "$http_port" == "80" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost # Add configuration for Hyperic monitoring <Location /server-status> SetHandler server-status Order allow,deny Allow from all # Allow from localhost </Location>
</VirtualHost>
EOF
# Copy the default index page into place cp /var/www/error/noindex.html /var/www/html/index.html fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port[$i]} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so
<VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port[$i]} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF # Add mod_status for Hyperic monitoring LoadModule status_module modules/mod_status.so ExtendedStatus On
<VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> # Add configuration for Hyperic monitoring <Location /server-status> SetHandler server-status Order deny,allow Deny from all # Allow from localhost Allow from 127.0.0.1 </Location>
<Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /server-status ! ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Start Apache server UPDATE on http_port, http_proxy_port, and/or http_node_port."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(http_port|http_proxy_port|http_node_port|http_node_ips|appsrv_routes)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
CONF_FILE="/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf"
# write the current http_proxy_port on which to listen to httpd conf file if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep -E 'http_proxy_port|http_port'` != "" ]]; then # set up static port and proxy port to listen if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then sed -i "/\(^Listen .*\)/{ N s/\(^Listen .*\)\(\nListen .*\)*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/ }" $CONF_FILE else # setup proxy port only to listen sed -i "/\(^Listen .*\)/{ N s/\(^Listen .*\)\(\nListen .*\)*/Listen $http_proxy_port/ }" $CONF_FILE fi fi
# Remove all the settings and set up with the new property values. LINE_NUM=`grep -n "^<VirtualHost .*" ${CONF_FILE} | sed -n 's/^\([0-9]*\)[:].*/\1/p' | sed -n '1p'` if [ ! ${LINE_NUM} == "" ]; then sed -ie "${LINE_NUM},\$"'d' ${CONF_FILE} fi
# Start re-configuration if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port[$i]} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port[$i]} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi
# restart httpd service service httpd restart
echo "Finished Apache server UPDATE"

echo "Start Apache server ROLLBACK on http_port, http_proxy_port, and/or http_node_port."

CONF_FILE="/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf"
# write the current http_proxy_port on which to listen to httpd conf file if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep -E 'http_proxy_port|http_port'` != "" ]]; then # set up static port and proxy port to listen if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then sed -i "/\(^Listen .*\)/{ N s/\(^Listen .*\)\(\nListen .*\)*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/ }" $CONF_FILE else # setup proxy port only to listen sed -i "/\(^Listen .*\)/{ N s/\(^Listen .*\)\(\nListen .*\)*/Listen $http_proxy_port/ }" $CONF_FILE fi fi
# Remove all the settings and set up with the new property values. LINE_NUM=`grep -n "^<VirtualHost .*" ${CONF_FILE} | sed -n 's/^\([0-9]*\)[:].*/\1/p' | sed -n '1p'` if [ ! ${LINE_NUM} == "" ]; then sed -ie "${LINE_NUM},\$"'d' ${CONF_FILE} fi
# Start re-configuration if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port[$i]} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port[$i]} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi
service httpd restart
echo "Finished Apache server ROLLACK"

ns9:component-version-script.description: Configure repo and install Apache server
ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install httpd
echo "Finished INSTALL for Apache service."

service-version.name: Hyperic HQ Agent
service-version.description: Hyperic HQ Agent 5.0.0 service Find, fix and prevent performance problems in custom web applications, whether running on physical, virtual, or cloud infrastructure. With its ability to continuously monitor 50,000 metrics across 75 web technologies, Hyperic provides sysadmins the deep visibility they need to ensure server performance, reduce downtime, and meet SLAs. Hyperic automatically discovers new virtual machines as they come online, eliminating the need for manual updating of monitoring configurations.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e source /etc/profile
#20140225 - Marco - Making script more robust and adding Hyperic server API call (so that crontab entry is now not needed). Adding also API calls to make Oracle configuration work automatically.
#tmp staging dir for setting up installer export INSTALL_PATH="/tmp/vmware/HQ"
LOG_FILE=/tmp/appdirector-agent.log
echo "Start Hyperic Agent configuration. " >> ${LOG_FILE}
HQ_AGENT_INSTALL_DIR=/home/hyperic/ # Hyperic agent home, e.g "/home/hyperic/hyperic-hq-agent-4.6.0" HQ_AGENT_HOME=`find ${HQ_AGENT_INSTALL_DIR} -name "hyperic-hqee-agent-*"` HQ_AGENT_PROPS=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/agent.properties
if [ "x${HQ_AGENT_PORT}" != "x" ] ; then
HQ_AGENT_PORT=${HQ_AGENT_PORT} else
HQ_AGENT_PORT=2144 fi
if [ "x${HQ_SERVER_IP}" != "x" ] ; then
HQ_SERVER_IP=${HQ_SERVER_IP} fi
echo "Start to write Hyperic property file." >> ${LOG_FILE}
echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.agent.server.AgentDListProvider=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.agent.server.MeasurementSchedule=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.layout.ConversionPattern=%d %-5p [%t] [%c{1}] %m%n" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.measurement.agent.server.SenderThread=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.apache.http=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.File=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/log/agent.log" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.category.org.apache.axis=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.MaxBackupIndex=1" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "autoinventory.runtimeScan.interval.millis=86400000" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.hq.product.pluginxml=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.appender.R.MaxFileSize=5000KB" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "agent.logLevel.SystemOut=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.hyperic.util.units=INFO" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.logger.org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate=ERROR" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "log4j.rootLogger=INFO, R" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS} echo "agent.logFile=${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/log/agent.log" >> ${HQ_AGENT_PROPS}
# Approve Platform echo "# Approve Platform" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "platform = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
# Approve MySQL if [ "x${HQ_approve_MySql}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve MySQL" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x.jdbcUser = ${HQ_MySQL_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.0.x.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_MySQL_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x.jdbcUser = ${HQ_MySQL_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "MySQL\ Stats\ 5.1.x.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_MySQL_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Postgres if [ "x${HQ_approve_PostgreSQL}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Postgres" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.user = ${HQ_Postgres_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.pass = ${HQ_Postgres_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 9.x.postgresql.program = ${HQ_Postgres_home}/bin/" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.user = ${HQ_Postgres_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.pass = ${HQ_Postgres_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "PostgreSQL\ 8.x.postgresql.program = ${HQ_Postgres_home}/bin/" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Tomcat if [ "x${HQ_approve_Tomcat}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Tomcat" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.username = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.password = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 6.0.jmx.url = service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_port}/jmxrmi" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties
echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.username = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_username}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.password = ${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_password}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ Tomcat\ 7.0.jmx.url = service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:${HQ_Tomcat_jmx_port}/jmxrmi" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve JBoss if [ "x${HQ_approve_JBoss}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve JBoss" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "JBoss\ 5.1 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve TC Server if [ "x${HQ_approve_TcServer}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve TC Server" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "SpringSource\ tc\ Runtime\ 7.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "SpringSource\ tc\ Runtime\ 6.0 = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
# Approve Apache if [ "x${HQ_approve_Apache}" != "x" ]; then echo "# Approve Apache" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Apache\ httpd = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
## Marco - Approve Oracle if [ "x${HQ_approve_Oracle}" != "x" ]; then echo "Oracle\ 11g = true" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcUrl = jdbc:oracle:thin:@${HQ_ORACLE_SERVER}.${HQ_ORACLE_DOMAIN}:${HQ_ORACLE_PORT}:${HQ_ORACLE_SID}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcPassword = ${HQ_ORACLE_PASSWORD}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.jdbcUser = ${HQ_ORACLE_USER}" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.tnsnames = network/admin/tnsnames.ora" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "Oracle\ 11g.process.ptql = State.Name.eq=oracle,Args.0.sw=ora_" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties echo "" >> ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/conf/auto-approve.properties fi
if [ -d ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data ]; then echo "rm -fR ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data" >> ${LOG_FILE} rm -fR ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/data fi
echo "Start Hyperic Agent." >> ${LOG_FILE} ${HQ_AGENT_HOME}/bin/hq-agent.sh start &>/tmp/agent.startup.log
if grep -q Failure /tmp/agent.startup.log; then echo "Failed to start Hyperic Agent." >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1 else echo "Hyperic Agent Started." >> ${LOG_FILE} ### If the agent starts, we can proceed with API calls to automatically add platforms and servers into Hyperic mv $HQ_API_PACKAGE $INSTALL_PATH/packages/hq_apis_src.tar.gz
HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR=/home/hyperic/
chmod 777 -R ${INSTALL_PATH}
echo "Unpack Hyperic API package." >> ${LOG_FILE} tar -xvzf $INSTALL_PATH/packages/hq_apis_src.tar.gz -C $HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR
# Hyperic agent home, e.g "/home/hyperic/hyperic-hq-agent-5.0" - Marco fixed. New name structure HQ_API_HOME=`find ${HQ_API_INSTALL_DIR} -name "hqapi1-client-*"`
echo $HQ_API_HOME
##Creating connection credentials mkdir ~/.hq echo "host=${HQ_SERVER_IP}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "port=${HQ_SERVER_PORT}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "secure=false" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "user=${HQ_ADMIN_USER}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties echo "password=${HQ_ADMIN_PASS}" >> ~/.hq/client.properties
MY_HOSTNAME=`hostname -f` #Waiting for the Platform to show up in Hyperic Server i=0; while [ "x`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh autodiscovery list|grep ${MY_HOSTNAME}`" = "x" ] do ((i++)); echo "Waiting for platform to show up in Hyperic Server. Try number ${i}" >> ${LOG_FILE} if [ $i -eq 10 ] then echo "Platform failed to show up in Hyperic Server" >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1; fi sleep 10; done echo "Found platform, adding it" >> ${LOG_FILE} ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh autodiscovery approve --regex="${MY_HOSTNAME}" >> ${LOG_FILE}
#Adding Servers (using Hyperic naming convention here...) that require specific activities for monitoring to automatically start ####Oracle DB Server#### i=0; if [ "x${HQ_approve_Oracle}" != "x" ]; then while [ "x`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --prototype="Oracle 11g"|grep "${MY_HOSTNAME}"|awk '{print $2;}'|sed s/id=//`" = "x" ] do ((i++)); echo "Waiting for Oracle server to show up in Hyperic Server. Try number ${i}" >> ${LOG_FILE} if [ $i -eq 10 ] then echo "Oracle server failed to show up in Hyperic Server" >> ${LOG_FILE} exit 1; fi sleep 10; done echo "Found Oracle Instance, adding it" >> ${LOG_FILE} ORACLE_HQ_ID=`${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --prototype="Oracle 11g"|grep "${MY_HOSTNAME}"|awk '{print $2;}'|sed s/id=//|sed s/\"//g` ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource list --id ${ORACLE_HQ_ID} >/tmp/oracleDescriptor.xml ${HQ_API_HOME}/bin/hqapi.sh resource sync --file /tmp/oracleDescriptor.xml fi ####End of Oracle DB Server####
fi
